name: Google Pixel (Very Silver, 128 GB)
description: The power of Google(TM), at your fingertips. Every touch, every interaction, every moment - made easy. Available in two sizes.

name: Google Pixel 2 XL Black 64 GB
description: Fullscreen Display, Aspect Ratio: 18:9, 3D Corning Gorilla Glass 5, Always-on Display, 100% DCI-P3 Coverage, 100000:1 Super Contrast Ratio, True Black Level, Full 24-bits Depth or 16.77 Million Colors.

name: Google Pixel XL (Quite Black, 32GB)
description: 12.3MP primary camera with phase detection autofocus (PDAF), laser detection autofocus (LDAF),4K (30 fps) video capture, HD 240 fps (8x) and full HD 120 fps (4x) slow motion video, CRI-90 dual-LED flash and 8MP front facing camera.

name: Apple iPhone X 64,GB
description: The iPhone X models have a 5.8" (diagonal) widescreen LED-backlit True Tone, wide color (P3) "Super Retina" with 3D Touch and a 2436x1125 native resolution at 458 ppi.

name: Apple iPhone X 256 GB
description: 12MP wide angle and telephoto primary camera with Dual optical image stabilization and Portrait Mode, Digital zoom up to 10x, Quad-LED True Tone flash and Slow sync,4K video recording at 24 fps or 30 fps or 60 fps and slow-motion video recording in 1080p at 120 fps, 7MP front facing TrueDepth camera with Retina Flash and Animoji feature

name: Nokia 6 (Matte Black, 32GB)
description: 16MP PDAF primary camera and 8MP AF front facing camera 13.97 centimeters (5.5-inch) FHD display with 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution Android v7.1.1 Nougat OS with Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 octa core processor

name: Lenovo K8 Note (Venom Black, 4GB) with New System Update
description: 13+5MP dual back camera and 13MP front facing camera with party flash Android v7.1.1 Nougat operating system with 2.3GHz Helio X23 10-core processor 13.97 (5.5-inch) Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS touchscreen with Gorilla Glass protection

name: OnePlus 5T (Midnight Black 6GB RAM + 64GB memory)
description: 20MP+16MP primary dual camera and 16MP front facing camera 15.26 centimeters (6.01-inch) capacitive touchscreen FHD Full Optic AMOLED 18:9 display with 2160 x 1080 pixels resolution. Cover Glass:2.5D Corning Gorilla Glass 5 OxygenOS based on Android 7.1.1 Nougat with Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 octa core processor 6 GB RAM, 64 GB internal memory and dual nano SIM dual-standby (4G+4G) 3300mAH lithium Polymer battery with Dash Charge technology Face Unlock, Fingerprint scanner, all-metal unibody and NFC enabled 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
